attributes.action: allow pistols to be held by FAC holders who belong to a target club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is not fair that only profesional deer hunters can currently apply for a pistol in the uk. it meens their is a lack of control over such firearms and the new 'long pistols' just arent good enough. by allowing FAC holders to own PROPER pistols and to keep them in an approved target club we can go back to enjoying our sport. the pistols would not be allowed to be kept at the FAC holders premesis therefore we can control the amount of pistols on the streets and safe law abiding shooters cannot be blamed for gung ho gang members.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow pistols to be held by FAC holders who belong to a target club."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15281.asp
